name: RatJar
description:
Ratjar is a game made in 72 hours for the 46th LudumDare game jam !

The main character is a rat, and this rat tries to escape through a city by being inside a jar, and you have to keep him alive by controlling the jar and avoiding obstacles ! Make sure you will never break the jar !

But this city has a lot of surprises for you, and a concept that seems so simple risks to bring much more challenge than expected !

"Keep it alive" was the theme of the game jam !

In only 72 hours we've made :

  • Models
  • Music
  • Game mechanics
